info: DELETE THIS FIELD, IT'S PURELY FOR CONVEYING INFORMATION; Change your config json file name to {name}_config.json so that .gitignore picks it up
type: {type of webdriver, 'chrome' for google chrome driver, 'firefox' for firefox}
wa_username: {Username for logging to D2L to get data}
wa_password: {Password for logging to D2L to get data}
